skilllist.skilldesc: Minsitthar's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Mark of the King</font>, up to 5 stacks. Upon reaching max stacks, the next attack detonates all <font color="a6aafb">Mark of the King</font> stacks, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 300<font color="26e407"> (+6% Total HP)</font> of Minsitthar's Max HP and stunning the target for 0.8s while healing Minsitthar for 300<font color="26e407"> (+6% Total HP)</font> HP. Can only trigger once every 6s on the same target.

Minsitthar thrusts forward with the Spear of Glory, dealing 175<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing enemies hit by 30%. Enemy heroes hit by the tip of the spear will be stunned for 0.6s. After a short delay, Minsitthar pulls back the spear, dealing 175<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to all enemies along the way and dragging enemy heroes hit to him.

Minsitthar awakens the power in his shield and releases it, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+180% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to all enemies in a rectangular area and slowing them by 80% (decaying rapidly over 2s). Meanwhile, he enters <font color="a6aafb">Phalanx</font> state for 3s, reducing damage taken from the front by 25% and enhancing his Basic Attack to swiftly strike an area in front of him.

Minsitthar charges forward and calls 4 Royal Guards to form a field around him. The Royal Guards cannot move but will attack enemies in the field and deal <font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to them.
Enemies in the field are slowed by 20% and cannot use movement skills.

data.name: Minsitthar

__data.skilldesc: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num2> [C1Magic Damage] to nearby enemies, [C2petrify] them for <Num1>s, and slow them by <%Num3> for <Num4>s afterward.
__data.skilldescemblem: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Can dish out damage and AOE CC.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Basic Attacks slow enemies by <%Num1> and reduce their Attack Speed by <%Num2>.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s (each Basic Attack reduces it by <Num5>s, down to <Num6>s)[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.

equiplist.equipskill1:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense
+15 Extra Magic Defense
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+8% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: MamaJess
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: A young king that led the people of Mahar Pura to victory against invaders.

assist.desc: Minsitthar works best with high damage Marksmen, such as Melissa and Hanabi, because he can create more opportunities for them to deal damage.

strong.desc: Minsitthar is strong against heroes that rely on mobility skills since his Ultimate disables them. Minsitthar can instantly negate the advantages of heroes like Lancelot, Benedetta and Arlott.

weak.desc: Minsitthar is countered by heroes with high Movement Speed, such as Zilong and Aulus, who can easily dodge his 1st Skill and run out of his Ultimate.
